item.title: Using Windows Subsystem for Linux for cross-platform testing
item.description: WSL is a wonderful feature to perform cross-plataform testing without having to install 3rd party virtualization software or containers.

item.title: Generating PDF in .NET Core using Libreoffice
item.description: Looking for Nuget extensions to generate PDF output? Here's an interesting option that uses templates in DOCX/HTML and performs the conversion.
